channel.title: Need Help with Squarespace Full BG video
channel.description:
[quote] Hi!
I found your tutorial http://www.cregox.com/full-video/ and I've been trying to figure out how to DIY the codes into my squarespace site.
I've been doing my best in following your instructions but I still couldn't get it to work. It would be extremely helpful if you could point me in the right direction and tell me what I'm doing wrong.
Here's a screenshot of my page so far. I'm using a sample video from Vimeo as the video I want to use is not done yet.
![image: Screen Shot 2015-08-02 at 4.03.57 pm.png](/uploads/default/original/1X/bfbcf4a11367bc8d6a858021f5599351e63fcc2a.png)
![image: Screen Shot 2015-08-02 at 4.04.08 pm.png](/uploads/default/original/1X/2ee7b305879f4c5003034eeeeb451ee2dd5d7859.png)
![image: Screen Shot 2015-08-02 at 4.04.17 pm.png](/uploads/default/original/1X/50ace4406507610424e9b06d66d6e20b075a2a19.png) ​
I'm trying to place a button on the homepage that plays a full screen video in a lightbox. As you can see, I've already done the following:
1. Added a gallery block (set to Grid and open in lightbox) 2. Added a button above the gallery block (Add the jquery code into it) 3. Added a code block below the video and pasted the long code that you provided
I can't figure out what I'm doing wrong and I hope you can help me out.
Your help would be greatly appreciated!
Yours sincerely,
Zulhilmy
From Singapore [/quote]

item.title: Need Help with Squarespace Full BG video
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Yeah, you probably didn't include the full code. The very first line isn't in your website source:

<script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.1.4/jquery.min.js"></script>

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with Squarespace Full BG video

item.title: Need Help with Squarespace Full BG video
item.dc:creator: @Alex_Dobrenko Alex Dobrenko
item.description:
@Alex_Dobrenko wrote:

Hi There!

I'm experiencing the same issues here - http://www.distancefornow.com/watch-the-pilot-2-1 (pw: 3000miles).

The youtube video is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=daZmCFVTmi0

and the code I've added to the image block is below.

javascript:jqueryLightbox('daZmCFVTmi0');

Can you point me in the direction of what I'm perhaps doing wrong?

Thanks a ton for your help!

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with Squarespace Full BG video

item.title: Need Help with Squarespace Full BG video
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Thanks for reaching out and pointing me a possible error on my tutorial there, among other few things I should probably fix.

You see, I'm no longer working with my now dead "your-home" project (although I am currently looking for a job), and these tutorials were part of it.

There's also only so much I can do without at least a link to the website.

That being said...

jQuery not loaded

This means the script couldn't find your link. Probably you didn't use your own video id there:

javascript:jqueryLightbox('<your video id comes here>');

Everything in red there, within the quotes, should be replaced by your own unique video id. And that will be different if you're using youtube, vimeo, wistia or whatever.

I've just updated a couple pages accordingly, with a few things fixed.

Good luck!

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with Squarespace Full BG video
